message:
[Action Options]
1) MOVE <target>, <target> can only be a cube.
2) SWEEP <target>, this moves the groom so it pushes the <target> into dustpan, only Bob can SWEEP, Alice must WAIT in front of the same <target> cube when Bob SWEEP.
3) WAIT, stays at the current spot.
4) DUMP, only when there are one or more cubes in the dustpan, Alice can DUMP it into trash_bin.
Only SWEEP a cube after both robots MOVEed to the cube.
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'EXECUTE
', then give exactly one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example#1: Let's start with the blue_cube_1 since it's the closest to us current. After that, I will WAIT while you SWEEP the blue_cube_1 into the dustpan.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
Example#2: Alice,since there are all cubes inside the dustpan.You can DUMP these cubes into the trash_bin while I WAIT.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
Example#3: Bob, since we are both in front of the green_cube_1 and it's less than 0.15 away from us, you can SWEEP the green_cube_1 while I WAIT into the dustpan.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_1

[Previous Round History]
== Previous Round# ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, since we are both already in front of yellow_cube_1 and it's the closest to us, I will WAIT while you SWEEP yellow_cube_1 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is 24.764!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Executed Action]
Alice: WAIT
Bob: SWEEP yellow_cube_1
== Current Round ==


You are a robot called Bob, and you are collaborating with Alice to sweep all yellow cube and green cube on the table and dump to the trash_bin as quickly as possible.
You hold a broom. 
To sweep up a cube, you and Alice must get close to it by MOVE to opposite sides of the same cube. You must move to the same cube as Alice before SWEEP.
Talk with Alice to coordinate together and decide which cube to sweep up first.
At the current round:
Your gripper is at (0.06, 0.86, 0.60), holding broom, in front of green_cube_1 with distance: 1.24, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 0.49, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 0.64, in front of green_cube_2 with distance: 1.46, in front of yellow_cube_2 with distance: 1.06, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 0.49, in front of green_cube_3 with distance: 0.65, in front of yellow_cube_3 with distance: 0.79
Alice's gripper is at (0.07, 0.16, 0.23), holding dustpan, in front of green_cube_1 with distance: 1.19, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 0.15, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 0.58, in front of green_cube_2 with distance: 1.43, in front of yellow_cube_2 with distance: 0.97, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 0.25, in front of green_cube_3 with distance: 0.43, in front of yellow_cube_3 with distance: 0.76
green_cube_1 is at (1.23, 0.49, 0.17), on the table; 
yellow_cube_1 is at (-0.02, 0.39, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
blue_cube_1 is at (-0.11, 0.42, 0.17), on the table; 
pink_cube_1 is at (0.61, 0.56, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_2 is at (1.47, 0.49, 0.17), on the table; 
yellow_cube_2 is at (1.01, 0.43, 0.17), on the table; 
red_cube_1 is at (0.29, 0.45, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_3 is at (-0.39, 0.40, 0.17), on the table; 
yellow_cube_3 is at (0.79, 0.59, 0.17), on the table; 
Think step-by-step about the task and Alice's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Never forget you are Bob!
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Each Alice or Bob's response will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
        

[Current Chat]
[Alice]:
Bob, let's target blue_cube_1 next since it's the closest cube to both of us. I will MOVE to blue_cube_1, and you should do the same. Once we're both in position, I'll WAIT while you SWEEP it into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is -1.956!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
The advantage score score is -1.956, it is too low to run, the answer may contain a misunderstanding of the state of the environment, you must change your action to raise the advantage score over 0!
You are Bob, your response is:

Alice, we should not target blue_cube_1 as it is not one of the cubes we need to sweep. Instead, let's focus on yellow_cube_2 since it's the closest yellow cube to both of us. I will MOVE to yellow_cube_2, and you should MOVE to yellow_cube_2 as well. After we are both in position, you can WAIT while I SWEEP it into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_2
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_2
